msg.msgText:
The values of the configuration items of a composite configuration objects that control messaging services, such as Message Hub, Policies, MQ Connectivity, etc., can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show help imaserver show object_type "Name=value" EXAMPLE:
imaserver show Endpoint "Name=TestEP"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
